00058 void GetPassword(char *password)
00059 {
00060   // create password dialog
00061   Qt_Pwd *pwd = new Qt_Pwd(password);
00062   // execute password dialog
00063   pwd->exec();
00064 }

00077 cmExperiment::cmExperiment(QString strClientName, QObject *parent,
00078                            const char *name) : QObject(parent, name)
00079 {
00080   // Set empty strings
00081   m_strHostName       = "";
00082   m_strExperimentName = "";
00083   m_strClientName     = strClientName;
00084   
00085   m_bConnected = FALSE;
00086 }

00096 //**********************************************************************
00109 BOOL cmExperiment::Connect(QString strHostName, QString strExperimentName, QString strClientName)
00110 {
00111   int status;
00112 
00113   // initialize variables
00114   m_bConnected    = FALSE;
00115   m_bTimerStarted = FALSE;
00116 
00117   // try to connect to midas host
00118   do {
00119     status = cm_connect_experiment1((char *)strHostName.ascii(),
00120                                     (char *)strExperimentName.ascii(),
00121                                     (char *)strClientName.ascii(), GetPassword,
00122                                     DEFAULT_ODB_SIZE, 20000); // increased timeout for W95
00123 
00124     if (status == CM_WRONG_PASSWORD) {
00125       MidasMessage("Password is incorrect");
00126       return FALSE;
00127     }
00128 
00129     if (status != CM_SUCCESS) { // midas error
00130       char str[256];
00131 
00132       cm_get_error(status, str);
00133       MidasMessage(str);
00134     }
00135 
00136   } while (status != CM_SUCCESS);
00137 
00138   // disable watchdog during debugging
00139 #ifdef _DEBUG
00140   cm_set_watchdog_params(TRUE, 0);
00141 #endif
00142 
00143   // route all messages to MidasMessage
00144   cm_set_msg_print(MT_ALL, MT_ALL, MidasMessage);
00145 
00146   // get handle to ODB
00147   cm_get_experiment_database(&m_hDB, NULL);
00148 
00149   // set connected flag
00150   m_bConnected = TRUE;
00151 
00152   return TRUE;
00153 }
00154 
00155 //**********************************************************************
00161 void cmExperiment::Disconnect()
00162 {
00163   cm_disconnect_experiment();
00164   m_bConnected = FALSE;
00165 }
00166 
00167 //**********************************************************************
00180 BOOL cmExperiment::StartTimer()
00181 {
00182   if (m_bTimerStarted)
00183     return TRUE;
00184 
00185   // create timer
00186   timer = new QTimer();
00187 
00188   // connect timer to event handler
00189   connect(timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), SLOT(timeOutProc()));
00190 
00191   // start timer
00192   if (!timer->start(500)) {
00193     MidasMessage("Cannot set timer");
00194     return FALSE;
00195   }
00196 
00197   m_bTimerStarted = TRUE;
00198 
00199   return TRUE;
00200 }
00201 
00202 //**********************************************************************
00211 void cmExperiment::timeOutProc()
00212 {
00213   int status;
00214 
00215   // tell MIDAS that hvEdit is still alive
00216   status = cm_yield(0);
00217 
00218   // check if MIDAS itself is still alive
00219   // check further if MIDAS did not through hvEdit out
00220   if (status == SS_ABORT || status == RPC_SHUTDOWN) {
00221     MidasMessage("Lost connection to the host");
00222   }
00223 }
